channel.title: three on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in three on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mt3: 1.5 hours to add three pieces
item.description: 14:08 Tuesday 14 November 2017 JST Funny to put it that way, but yeah today about 30 minutes per glued piece, if I recall correctly. I went to bed early last night and woke up early to get started on MT3. Right now I am on the train so don’t have the clip ID handy.. oh but Chrome remembered it. And here is the livestream https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H3jQqWMIZFA I am optimistic that the pieces I glued in place will prove to have been glued in correct enough places to stay put.
